short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open links to Zendesk tickets within one tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more juggling multiple tabs. Our extension intuitively channels all Zendesk ticket links directly to your already existing Zendesk tab. Streamline your workflow, enhance efficiency and improve your browser's performance significantly. It's that simple. Bonkers, we know.

This extension will remain free of charge forever.
